citations.narrative:
The record of animals on hand was incomplete and there was no acquisition information available for the macaws or the
grey foxes. Facility has had the macaws for many years, but estimated that the grey foxes, Squilly & Dilly had arrived in
July of 2021 at approximately 8 months old. Complete and accurate records are needed to ensure each animal can be
known with certainty and facilitate the ability to trace all animals. The licensee shall make, keep and maintain records or
forms which correctly disclose the required information concerning animals other than dogs or cats, purchased or
otherwise acquired, or which is transported, sold, euthanized or otherwise disposed of by the exhibitor, including any
offspring born.
Correct by 18 March, 2024

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
In the macaw outdoor enclosure, there was a songbird nest built between the fence top and the cover, and the avian
pests were freely entering and leaving the enclosure, contaminating the food and water. Additionally, in the kitchen area,
there was also a collection of flies that was circling above the food items not stored in the fridges or freezers. A safe and
effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites and avian and mammalian pests must be established and
maintained so as to promote the health and well-being of the birds and reduce contamination by pests in animal areas.
Correct by 19 March, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
Geoffrey Olsen, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The record of animals on hand was incomplete and there was no acquisition information available for the macaws or the 
grey foxes. Facility has had the macaws for many years, but estimated that the grey foxes, Squilly & Dilly had arrived in 
July of 2021 at approximately 8 months old. Complete and accurate records are needed to ensure each animal can be 
known with certainty and facilitate the ability to trace all animals. The licensee shall make, keep and maintain records or 
forms which correctly disclose the required information concerning animals other than dogs or cats, purchased or 
otherwise acquired, or which is transported, sold, euthanized or otherwise disposed of by the exhibitor, including any 
offspring born. 
 
Correct by 18 March, 2024 
3.158(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
In the macaw outdoor enclosure, there was a songbird nest built between the fence top and the cover, and the avian 
pests were freely entering and leaving the enclosure, contaminating the food and water. Additionally, in the kitchen area, 
there was also a collection of flies that was circling above the food items not stored in the fridges or freezers. A safe and 
effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites and avian and mammalian pests must be established and 
maintained so as to promote the health and well-being of the birds and reduce contamination by pests in animal areas. 
 
Correct by 19 March, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Geoffrey Olsen, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
